commitResults.messageTitle: Update developer guide with FAP class details and UML diagram
commitResults.messageBody:
- Elaborated on the design and implementation of the FAP main class
- Added a UML class diagram to visually represent the FAP class structure and its interactions with other components
- Provided a foundational overview for further enhancements and documentation
Update developer guide with FAP class details and UML diagram

commitResults.messageTitle: Add unit tests for FAP initialization and error handling
commitResults.messageBody:
- Implemented tests in FAPTest to validate the initialization process with both valid and invalid user input
- Tested the system's response to incomplete commands to ensure error messages are displayed as expected
- Utilized ByteArrayInputStream and ByteArrayOutputStream to simulate user input and capture system output for assertions

commitResults.messageTitle: Improve cross-platform test consistency in FAPTest

commitResults.messageBody: Add unit tests for FAP initialization and error handling

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Storage class and package for module data persistence
commitResults.messageBody:
- Create new package `seedu.duke.storage` for organized storage management
- Introduce `Storage` class handling the serialization and deserialization of module data to/from files
- Implement `saveModulesToFile` for writing module list to a specified file path
- Add `loadModulesFromFile` to read and reconstruct module objects from file data
- Include utility methods `ensureDirectoryExists` and `createFile` to manage file system prerequisites
- Facilitate module data persistence across application sessions

commitResults.messageTitle: Integrate module data persistence and enhance Module toString output
commitResults.messageBody:
- Integrated `loadModulesFromFile` and `saveModulesToFile` methods into the main class for persistent module data management
- Enhanced the `Module.toString` method to include the `moduleTaken` field, improving module data visibility

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor Storage class to integrate JSON manager for module data
commitResults.messageBody:
- Modified `Storage` class methods to utilize `jsonManager` for retrieving module credits and descriptions
- Updated `getModule` method to include module existence check using `jsonManager` before adding to the list
- Altered the serialization process in `saveModulesToFile` to append module status and grade
- Implemented exception handling for file operations and module data parsing to improve reliability and data integrity
- Ensured directory and file creation for module data storage with enhanced checks
Implement Storage Package for Module Data Persistence

- Corrected the method call from `setModuleStatus` to `setModuleTaken` within the `Storage` class to align with the existing method name in the `Module` class, fixing a compilation issue
- Modified `.gitignore` to exclude `moduleList.txt` from version control, preventing accidental inclusion of local module data in future commits
Update method reference and modify .gitignore
Add and Integrate User class into FAP

- Add user info saving and loading in Storage class
- Use first data file line for user profile
- Ensure user state persistence across sessions

- Move file path construction to main method
- Modify loadDataFromFile to accept file path argument

commitResults.messageTitle: Improve storage error handling and update file naming
commitResults.messageBody:
- Added `StorageException` for unified error handling
- Updated exception handling in storage methods
- Renamed file to 'cs2113_AY2324_FAP_Storage.txt' for better context

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor program logic for enhanced testability
commitResults.messageBody:
- Revised program's logic flow to eliminate `System.exit` usage, facilitating more robust and isolated testing scenarios
- Modified FAP, Storage, Ui classes to support graceful shutdown process without relying on abrupt termination
- Updated FAPTest to adapt to new program behavior, ensuring tests accurately reflect user interaction and application state management

commitResults.messageTitle: Enhance FAPTest and update UI tests for UserStorage functionality
commitResults.messageBody:
- Updated FAPTest to backup and restore user info, ensuring tests do not alter application state
- Adjusted EXPECTED.TXT to match new expected outputs reflecting changes in user information handling
- Added a new data file (CS2113_AY2324S2_FAP_Storage.txt) under text-ui-test to simulate user data storage for testing
- Modified input.txt in text-ui-test to align with the new testing setup and scenarios

commitResults.messageTitle: Enhance ModuleList and add Storage tests
commitResults.messageBody:
- Implemented `clearModules` method in `ModuleList` to support clearing all module entries, improving testability
- Removed `ExceptionHandleTest` as part of test suite optimization
- Added `StorageTest` class to cover storage operations, ensuring data saving and loading behaviors are correctly implemented and error-handling is robust

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix GRADE_PATTERN minor bug & Change argument data structure
commitResults.messageBody:
GRADE_PATTERN allows [+-] grade without a character before.
Change parser command arguments to use map<string,string> type instead of arrays to reduce chances of using magic literals.
The CommandMetadata class encapsulates metadata about a command pattern, its associated group arguments, and a constructor function to instantiate the corresponding command object.
